name: 胡同來
objective:
本課程為行銷在企業經營所扮演的策略性角色，課程設計以管理理論來探討行銷策略與企業併購的重要議題。課程內容包含行銷概念、行銷環境、行銷策略、競爭策略、併購策略、談判策略。身為企業經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，可以做出最佳的管理決策。
This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of marketing as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The concept of marketing, marketing environment, marketing strategy, marketing competition, merger & acqusition( M&A) Strategy, negotiation strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best manage decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.
